testCases.label: Test for equal values
testCases.description: Verifies that if two input integers are equal, the decide method returns 'Equal'.

testCases.label: Test for greater than comparison
testCases.description: Verifies that if the first integer is greater than the second integer, the decide method returns 'Greater'.

testCases.label: Test for lesser than comparison
testCases.description: Verifies that if the first integer is less than the second integer, the decide method returns 'Lesser'.
